bach_open_taxonomy.FeatureFrame.display_sankey¶

FeatureFrame.display_sankey(stack_column=None, text_in_title=None, node_color='blue')[source]¶

Display the Sankey chart of a location stack. This function queries the database.

Param

stack_column. The column for which to display the chart. If None the location stack with which the Feature Frame is initialized is selected.

Parameters

  • text_in_title (Optional[str]) – A text to display in the title of the graph.

  • node_color – Optionally the color of the nodes can be adjusted.
